news.title: Steve Rosenberg: What latest Ukraine talks reveal about Putin's state of mind
news.summary: Russia's president looks determined to continue his war in Ukraine - even as the country's economic problems grow.

news.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
news.summary: Vincent Chan admitted 26 sexual offences relating to children aged between two and four in what the Met Police called one of their most "harrowing and complex" cases.

news.title: UK government withheld information from Harry Dunn's family after his death, report says
news.summary: Dame Anne Owers issues a report into the government's response to Mr Dunn's death outside a US base.

news.title: Women's Institute to stop offering trans women membership
news.summary: The National Federation of Women's Institutes said it made the decision with “sincere regret”.

news.title: Spotify Wrapped reveals most-played artists of 2025 - but who's yours?
news.summary: The app reveals its top artists of the year, as users find out who they've been playing most often.

news.title: Baby milk can be bought with supermarket loyalty points
news.summary: The government claims that parents who cannot or chose not to breastfeed could save £500 a year.

news.title: King Charles welcomes German president on first state visit in 27 years
news.summary: Germany's president has received a ceremonial welcome from the King and will get a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

news.title: I was forced into a marriage, then I was beaten by my husband and enslaved by my in-laws
news.summary: "Sara" was told if she left the house, she would be attacked and raped by British people.

news.title: Drunk raccoon found passed out on liquor store floor after breaking in
news.summary: The intoxicated animal suffered no injuries and was released back into the wild by animal protection once sober.

news.title: Streeting brands doctors' union 'moaning minnies' over GP online booking
news.summary: All NHS practices were required by the government to provide web bookings from October - but the union opposes the move.
